name: Space's Plague
description:
A virus has been released into your ship as a result of an alien attack and is contaminated almost entirely. As Xander, a firearm expert, or Zach, a sword master, it’s up to you to walk the narrow, dark corridors of contaminated creatures to save the crew or to escape…

This game was made during my first year of programming. (2019-2020)

I did the level design, the programming and the graphics myself, expected for the backgrounds. I did not do OST or SFX

Control (keyboard, mouse / ps4 controller): 

Move : ZQSD / Joystick 

Jump : Left Click / Cross

Shoot : Right Click / Square

Interact : Middle Click / Triangle

Sorry the controls really suck on the keyboard. I never changed that but that may change soon..... maybe....

PS : the game is easier with Xander (especially the boss)
